title: Edo's Hummus Kuche
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Hummus is a main course in Israel, Lebanon and other Middle Eastern countries. Almost all dishes are vegan, except one hummus topping contains meat. Uses separate cooking utensils for the meat dish. Also has vegan salads like tabouleh and Mediterranean potato salad with sundried tomatoes and beans. Uses no additives. All food is made-in-house daily. Wi-fi.
